The '''2025–26 Robert Morris Colonials men's ice hockey season''' will be the 20th season of play for the program and the 2nd in Atlantic Hockey America. The Colonials will represent Robert Morris University in the 2025–26 NCAA Division I men's ice hockey season, play their home games at the Clearview Arena and be coached by Derek Schooley in his 20th season.
